person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Newmont , in fact , will not benefit from the Santa Fe acquisition on an earnings basis for at least two years , which also limits its capacity to raise its offer .

Let's think step by step.

1. Newmont

"Newmont" is the only proper noun in the paragraph that refers to a person (in this case, a corporation). A person entity is a person, company, organization, or any other entity that has a distinct identity. In this case, Newmont is a mining corporation, and it is the entity that is the subject of the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
There are no irrelevant entities in the paragraph as it only contains one proper noun "Newmont" which clearly refers to a person entity, which is a corporation.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
